questions.title: Informal Letter Format
questions.question: What is the format of an Informal Letter?
paragraphs: 1. SENDER'S ADDRESS (Top Left): • Write your house name/number • Street name • Area/Locality • City - PIN Code • Example: Dhvani 16/8, 21st Cross Street Indira Nagar, Adyar Chennai - 600020
2. DATE (Below Address): • Leave one line after address • Write the date in full • Example: 10th February 2026
3. SALUTATION (Greeting): • For friends: Dear [Name], • For relatives: Dear [Relation], or My dear [Name], • Always followed by a comma

4. BODY (3 Paragraphs): • Paragraph 1: Ask about their well-being, mention why you are writing • Paragraph 2: Main content - give details about the topic • Paragraph 3: Conclude, ask them to reply or visit
5. CLOSING (Subscription): • For friends: Your loving friend, or Your best friend, • For relatives: Your loving [relation], or Your affectionate [relation], • Always followed by a comma
6. SIGNATURE: • Write your name below the closing

questions.title: Opening & Closing Phrases
questions.question: What are common phrases used in Informal Letters?
paragraphs: OPENING PHRASES (Paragraph 1): • How are you? I hope you are doing well. • I hope this letter finds you in good health. • It has been a long time since I heard from you. • I was very happy to receive your letter. • Thank you for your lovely letter. • I am writing to tell you about...
BODY PHRASES (Paragraph 2): • You will be happy to know that... • I am excited to share that... • I wanted to tell you about... • Let me describe... • The best part was...

CLOSING PHRASES (Paragraph 3): • Please convey my regards to... • Give my love to everyone at home. • I am eagerly waiting for your reply. • Do write back soon. • I hope to see you soon. • Looking forward to hearing from you.
SUBSCRIPTION OPTIONS: • Your loving friend, • Your best friend, • Your affectionate cousin, • Your loving nephew/niece, • With love, • Yours lovingly,

questions.title: Sample Letter Layout
questions.question: Show a sample layout of an Informal Letter.
paragraphs: How are you? I hope you and your family are doing well. It has been a long time since we met. I am writing to tell you about my summer vacation. You will be happy to know that I went to Ooty with my family last month. We stayed there for five days. The weather was very pleasant. We visited the Botanical Garden, Ooty Lake, and Doddabetta Peak. The best part was the toy train ride. It was my first time on a mountain railway. The views were breathtaking! Please convey my regards to uncle and aunty. I hope to see you soon. Do write back and tell me about your holidays.
questions.answer: Dhvani 16/8, 21st Cross Street Indira Nagar, Adyar Chennai - 600020 10th February 2026 Dear Rahul, How are you? I hope you and your family are doing well. It has been a long time since we met. I am writing to tell you about my summer vacation. You will be happy to know that I went to Ooty with my family last month. We stayed there for five days. The weather was very pleasant. We visited the Botanical Garden, Ooty Lake, and Doddabetta Peak. The best part was the toy train ride. It was my first time on a mountain railway. The views were breathtaking! Please convey my regards to uncle and aunty. I hope to see you soon. Do write back and tell me about your holidays. Your loving friend, Anirudh
